context: I'm good! My brother is coming to visit and I want to queue up some good old fashioned monster movies for him. Any suggestions?
It could also be a modern version of an old fashioned monster movie, or something that has them in it. For example, The Cabin in the Woods is a good example of a modern monster movie.
Well, Monster (2008) isn't really the type of movie I was looking for. Isn't that the one with Charleze Theron?
I haven't seen Pacific Rim (2013) . Is it a monster movie?
Yes it is! Have you seen Creature of the Walking Dead (1965)
My brother likes Dracula (1931) and Frankenstein (1931) , that type of thing. Oh, Creature of the Walking Dead (1965) sounds PERFECT.
Yes it’s not super good classic movie !
Thank you for the suggestion!! It's the kind of thing my brother likes. He's a nerd. :)
resp: Wolfman (1979) is pretty great as well :) Hahah im I’m glad I could a help

context.content: "I'm a Cyborg, But That's OK (2006)" is a South Korean romantic comedy-drama film directed by Park Chan-wook. It tells the story of a young woman who believes she is a cyborg and is institutionalized. The film explores themes of mental health, identity, and the human experience in a whimsical and thought-provoking manner. It balances elements of inspiration, emotion, and suspense, offering a unique and touching cinematic experience.
